title: 游戏报错，有代码高手么
author: DS78
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 310271fd --------
Generated 12-8-25 下午11:40

- Minecraft Version: 1.3.1
- Operating System: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
- Java Version: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
- Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
- Memory: 75454880 bytes (71 MB) / 166379520 bytes (158 MB) up to 1060372480 bytes (1011 MB)
- JVM Flags: 4 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1024m -XX:PermSize=64m -XX:MaxPermSize=128m
- ModLoader: Mods loaded: 14

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 全是ModLoader的错，这是没办法的事。1.3.1、1.3.2的ModLoader目前是有这种bug的。在modloader的作者进行修复升级前，暂时没有解决办法。
